price: 11. ‘There are among us some that are righteous, and some the contrary; we are groups having different ways (religious sects).
arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَۖ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدٗا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wa-annā minnā al-ṣāliḥūna waminnā dūna dhālika kunnā ṭarāiqa qidadan
